sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details>We will create an action to allow the user assigned to the call to confirm the assignment. </details> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001027</number> <replaced_by/> <script>Right-Click on top bar of form | Personalize | UI Actions | New Enter Name, Table, select Form Button and List Choice Condition = current.assigned_to == gs.getUserID() Script =  current.u_project_intake_status = 'Assignment Confirmed' current.update(); action.setRedirectURL(current); </script> <script_2/> <script_type>UI Action</script_type> <short_description>Create an action for the form </short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-12 00:49:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b566d1fb13012a00dd7db5b12244b08e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-14 03:14:29</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
